attributes.action: Should The Post Office In Dalton Stay Open?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IF YOU THOUGHT THAT THE POST OFFICE (ANTY CROSS) SHOULD NOT OF BEEN CLOSED SIGN THIS PETITION AND TRY AND MAKE IT STAY OPEN!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
